programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: The Closers / Caught by an Eyelash
programme.desc: A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A killer's bite marks and a jailhouse snitch lead to a murder conviction in a case gone cold for eight years, and a group of super sleuths try to solve the slaying

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: In late 1983, the bodies of 5 people are found brutally murdered in an oil field.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: A Brother's Burden / The Midnight Attacker (#88)
programme.desc: A police officer helps solve an 18-year-old murder case when he finds the prime suspect-his older brother.

programme.desc: Police play a wild hunch that pays off in the capture of a serial rapist.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 year ago, we reevaluate the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Business cards plus DNA technology reveal the killer of a New York woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Bill Kurtis narrates this look at the last 48 hours before the scheduled execution of Michael Johnson, convicted in the senseless killing of Jeff Wetterman 11 years earlier.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Examining college students' work on cases of jailed murderers claiming innocence.
